home.name: Hello, I am Romain Frezier.
home.role: I am 22 years old and I'm a 5th (and last) year engineering student in Computer Science and Management at Polytech Montpellier, France.
home.roleDescription: I'm currently working at Infomaniak in Geneva for my end-of-studies internship.

contact.serious: Don't hesitate to contact me for any job proposal or for any other information, I will be happy to answer you
contact.fun: You can also contact me if you don't find the secret feature :)

about.title: About Me
about.aboutme1: As a sports lover, particularly of mountain sports such as hiking and ski touring, I like to go on long outings to push my physical and mental limits. I also enjoy photographing mountain landscapes.
about.aboutme2: With a strong sense of teamwork, I know how to motivate colleagues and lead projects effectively. My experience in team sports and outdoor activities has strengthened my ability to manage stress and make quick decisions.
